title: Lowest insurance and financial services imports
description: In 2023, Mauritania had one of the lowest percentages of insurance and financial services as part of its service imports, at just 0.037%.

title: Lowest R&D expenditure
description: In 2018, Mauritania spent only 0.01% of its GDP on research and development, one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Longest lead time to import
description: In 2016, the median lead time to import goods into Mauritania was 32 days, one of the longest durations worldwide.

title: Lowest insurance and financial services in commercial imports
description: In 2023, insurance and financial services made up only 0.039% of Mauritania's commercial service imports, among the lowest globally.
